The First Installment of The Sinner Is Now Streaming on Netflix!
With the new story of The Sinner less than month away, now is the time to binge-watch the first installment of USA Network's anthology series starring Jessica Biel and Bill Pullman on Netflix!
The First Installment of The Sinner Is Now Streaming on Netflix!
Harry Ambrose Pullman finds himself obsessed with uncovering the woman's buried motive, which launches an inverted and utterly surprising crime thriller whose driving force is not the “who” or the “what” -- but the “why.”
Critically acclaimed and wildly popular, The Sinner 's first installment, which premiered on USA Network last summer, was the new cable series of 2017.
The series also garnered two Golden Globe nominations for Best Television Limited Series or Motion Picture Made for Television and Best Performance by an Actress in Limited Series or Motion Picture Made for Television for Jessica Biel and Critics’ Choice Award nominations for Best Actor in Movie Made for TV or Limited Series, and Best Actress in Movie Made for TV or Limited Series So, what are you waiting for?
Netflix and chill this summer with The Sinner streaming NOW!
